sentences.en: A matter of repeated occurrence like this will not astonish people.
sentences.cn: 这样司空见惯的事,不会使人吃惊.

sentences.en: Above all, it will astonish them.
sentences.cn: 总的来说, 悉尼都将会使他们感到惊奇.

sentences.en: Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
sentences.cn: 坚持做正确的事. 这会让一些人满意,让其他人惊奇.

sentences.en: He purposed to both charm and astonish me by his appearance.
sentences.cn: 他是想以他的外貌让我着迷,使我吃惊.
她的回答让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: His magic act will amaze and astonish you.
sentences.cn: 他的神奇表现将会令你惊叹不止.

sentences.en: If we go on to the top of the bus, our conduct will astonish the Browns.
sentences.cn: 如果我们爬到公共汽车顶上, 我们的行为将被认为是荒谬的.

sentences.en: It astonished him that she had changed so little.
sentences.cn: 他很惊讶，她几乎没怎么变。

sentences.en: It will astonish you to hear what I paid for this ring.
sentences.cn: 听到我花多少钱买这枚戒指会使你大吃一惊.
我的消息会让你感到十分惊讶的。

sentences.en: Sensations Sydney hasn't experienced in over two years surprise and then astonish her.
sentences.cn: 两年多未有过的体会先让她意外,接着又让她惊讶.
以悌摩西那样衰弱的神经,这件事准会吓坏他.

sentences.en: The decision makes everybody feels astonish.
sentences.cn: 决定使大家都感到震动.

sentences.en: The duke answered,'Once that bird starts to fly and sing, it will astonish the world.'
sentences.cn: 齐威王说: “ 这鸟不飞则罢,一飞就冲天;不鸣则罢, 一鸣就惊人. ”

sentences.en: The gigantic creation you're about to see might astonish the most serious cartoon enthusiasts.
sentences.cn: 地球人都知道,小男孩儿爱玩玩具.变形金刚或许是他们最喜欢玩的玩具之一了吧.

sentences.en: The gigantic creation you're about to see might even astonish the most serious cartoon enthusiasts.
sentences.cn: 而接下来你要看到的这个巨型机器人恐怕是连铁杆卡通迷也要为之大吃一惊.

sentences.en: What astonishes me most is his complete lack of fear.
sentences.cn: 最令我吃惊的是，他什么都不怕。
